info.description: This is an API description for [Moira Alert API](https://moira.readthedocs.io/en/latest/overview.html).
info.title: Moira Alert

put.summary: Creates a new contact notification for the current user
Updates an existing notification contact to the values passed in the request body

parameters.description: ID of the contact to update
parameters.name: contactId

delete.summary: Deletes notification contact for the current user and remove the contact ID from all subscriptions

parameters.description: ID of the contact to remove
parameters.name: contactId

post.summary: Push a test notification to verify that the contact is properly set up

parameters.description: The ID of the target contact
parameters.name: contactId

get.summary: Gets all trigger events for current page and their count

parameters.description: Number of items to be displayed on one page
parameters.name: size

parameters.description: Defines the number of the displayed page. E.g, p=2 would display the 2nd page
parameters.name: p

200.description: Update state of the Moira service

get.summary: Gets a paginated list of notifications, all notifications are fetched if end = -1 and start = 0

parameters.description: ID of the subscription to update
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: ID of the subscription to remove
parameters.name: subscriptionId

put.summary: Send a test notification for a subscription

parameters.description: ID of the subscription to send the test notification
parameters.name: subscriptionId

get.summary: Get all tags and their subscriptions

parameters.description: Name of the tag to remove
parameters.name: tag

error.example: resource with the ID does not exist
resource with ID '66741a8c-c2ba-4357-a2c9-ee78e0e7' does not exist

message.example: Moira has been turned off for maintenance

alone_metrics.description: A list of targets that have only alone metrics

created_at.description: Datetime when the trigger was created

expression.description: Used if you need more complex logic than provided by WARN/ERROR values

is_remote.description: Shows if trigger is remote (graphite-backend) based or stored inside Moira-Redis DB

mute_new_metrics.description: If true, first event NODATA  OK will be omitted

sched.description: Determines when Moira should monitor trigger

tags.description: Set of tags to manipulate subscriptions

ttl.description: When there are no metrics for trigger, Moira will switch metric to TTLState state after TTL seconds

ttl_state.description: When there are no metrics for trigger, Moira will switch metric to TTLState state after TTL seconds

updated_at.description: Datetime  when the trigger was updated

tags.description: APIs for working with Moira contacts. For more details, see <https://moira.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installation/webhooks_scripts.html#contact/>
tags.name: contact

tags.description: View Moira's runtime configuration. For more details, see <https://moira.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installation/configuration.html>
tags.name: config

tags.description: APIs for interacting with notification events. See <https://moira.readthedocs.io/en/latest/user_guide/trigger_page.html#event-history/> for details
tags.name: event

tags.description: interact with Moira states/health status. See <https://moira.readthedocs.io/en/latest/user_guide/selfstate.html#self-state-monitor/> for details
tags.name: health

tags.description: manage notifications that are currently in queue. See <https://moira.readthedocs.io/en/latest/user_guide/hidden_pages.html#notifications/>
tags.name: notification

tags.description: APIs for interacting with graphite patterns in Moira. See <https://moira.readthedocs.io/en/latest/development/architecture.html#pattern/>
tags.name: pattern

tags.description: APIs for managing a user's subscription(s). See <https://moira.readthedocs.io/en/latest/development/architecture.html#subscription/> to learn about Moira subscriptions
tags.name: subscription

tags.description: APIs for managing tags (a grouping of tags and subscriptions). See <https://moira.readthedocs.io/en/latest/user_guide/subscriptions.html#tags/>
tags.name: tag

tags.description: APIs for interacting with Moira triggers. See <https://moira.readthedocs.io/en/latest/development/architecture.html#trigger/> to learn about Triggers
tags.name: trigger

tags.description: APIs for interacting with Moira teams
tags.name: team

tags.description: APIs for interacting with Moira subscriptions owned by certain team
tags.name: teamSubscription

tags.description: APIs for interacting with Moira contacts owned by certain team.
tags.name: teamContact
